nodes.text: Territory Administration was one of the divisions headed by a Viceprex in the Corporate Sector Authority. The division worked with the other divisions to shape the Authority's general policies into a business plan administered by territory. Territory Administration was broken down into a strict structure; twenty-nine territories controlled by a Territorial Administrator, broken down into regions headed by a Regional Director, subdivided into zones run by a Zone Director, and finally into individual markets run by Supervisors. Tanna Odann held the post of Viceprex of Territory Administration in 2 ABY.
